mapper.insert: insert into classification(classification_num, business_id, classification_name) values(#{classificationNum}, #{businessId}, #{classificationName})

insert into menu(menu_num, menu_name, menu_comment, menu_price, menu_picture, classification_num, business_id) values(#{menuNum}, #{menuName}, #{menuComment}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuPicture}, #{classificationNum}, #{businessId})
mapper.update: update menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_comment = #{menuComment}, menu_price = #{menuPrice}, menu_picture = #{menuPicture}, classification_num = #{classificationNum}, business_id = #{businessId} where menu_num = #{menuNum}
